Package it.polimi.ingsw

Class PersonalBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PersonalBoard
public class PersonalBoard
extends java.lang.Object
This class represent the board that every player had, it is composed by different items and include different board

    • getStrongbox

      public Strongbox getStrongbox()

    • insertCard

      public boolean insertCard​(DevelopmentCard card, int position)
      Public method. insertCard method inserts developmentCards in their own slots, if it is permitted and if the player can pay the card's cost from his warehouse, from his strongbox, or from both
      Parameters:
      card - indicate which card insert
      position - indicate where the card will be inserted

    • payDevelopmentCard

      public boolean payDevelopmentCard​(java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> cost)
      Public method. payDevelopmentCard method is called by DevelopmentCard when a player wants to insert that DevelopmentCard in his own personalBoard. This method checks if the player has got the necessary resources in the warehouse. If he has enough resources in the warehouse to pay the card, this method takes all the necessary resources from the warehouse, else it takes all the possible resources from the warehouse and it takes the remaining resources from the strongbox. If the player hasn't got the necessary resources summing resources in his strongbox plus resources in his warehouse to pay the card, the method returns false and it doesn't take any resources from warehouse and strongbox.
      Parameters:
      cost - contains resource types to pay the card and relatives quantity
      Returns:
      boolean

    • checkFromExtraDep

      public boolean checkFromExtraDep​(int whichExtraDep, int quantityToCheck)
      Public method. Check if there are resource type to use in the extra deposit
      Parameters:
      whichExtraDep - indicate if check into extra deposit 1 or 2
      quantityToCheck - indicate of many resources need to be checked
      Returns:
      false if there aren't resources available

    • payFromExtraDep

      public boolean payFromExtraDep​(int whichExtraDep, int quantityToPay)
      Public method. Pay the resource from the extradeposit
      Parameters:
      whichExtraDep - indicate if check into extra deposit 1 or 2
      quantityToPay - indicate of many resources will be used
      Returns:
      false if there aren't resources available

    • insertResources

      public boolean insertResources​(ResourceType resource, int level, int quantity)
      Public method. insertResources method is called when a player takes resources form market: the player chooses what type of resource and the quantity of that resource to add in the warehouse. The player chooses the level where to put those resources and the method add the resources chosen into the level chosen by the player.
      Parameters:
      resource - indicate the type of resource
      quantity - indicate how many resource
      level - indicate the level where the resource will be taken

    • activateProductionFromDevCard

      public boolean activateProductionFromDevCard​(int slot)
      Public method activateProductionFromDevCard method is called when a player activate a production form a DevelopmentCard in his PersonalBoard. The method calls the production from the DevelopmentCard
      Parameters:
      slot - indicate the slot of the card

    • activateProductionFromPersonalBoard

      public boolean activateProductionFromPersonalBoard​(ResourceType resourceType1, ResourceType resourceType2, ResourceType obtainedResource)
      Public method. activateProductionFromPersonalBoard represents the basic production power. The player choose two resources of any type as payment and he obtains back one resource of any type(the player chooses the resource type).
      Parameters:
      resourceType1 - is the first resource to activate production
      resourceType2 - is the second resource to activate production( can be the same type of first resource )
      obtainedResource - is the resource obtained after production
      Returns:
      true if the player has got( in his warehouse or strongbox )the chosen resources to activate production

    • takeResourcesFromWarehouse

      public boolean takeResourcesFromWarehouse​(ResourceType resource, int quantity)
      Public method. takeResourcesFromWarehouse method is called by the DevelopmentCard when the player activate production on that DevelopmentCard. This method checks if the player has enough resources in his warehouse to activate production and takes resources from warehouse if he has it. This method returns a boolean: if the boolean is true it means the player has enough resources to activate production.
      Parameters:
      quantity - indicate the quantity taken from warehouse
      resource - indicate the type of resource

    • checkResourcesIntoWarehouse

      public boolean checkResourcesIntoWarehouse​(ResourceType resource, int quantity)
      Public method. checkResourcesIntoWarehouse method checks if the warehouse contains a certain quantity of a resource type
      Parameters:
      resource - says what resource type has to check
      quantity - says how many resources warehouse has to contains
      Returns:
      true if warehouse contains at least that quantity of that resource

    • missingResourcesIntoWarehouse

      public int missingResourcesIntoWarehouse​(ResourceType resource, int requestedQuantity)
      Public method. missingResourcesIntoWarehouse method checks how many resources are missing in the warehouse to reach a certain quantity of that resource type and remove them.
      Parameters:
      resource - represents the resource type to check
      requestedQuantity - is the quantity to check
      Returns:
      how many resources misses

    • missingResourcesIntoWarehouseWithoutRemove

      public int missingResourcesIntoWarehouseWithoutRemove​(ResourceType resource, int requestedQuantity)
      Public method. missingResourcesIntoWarehouse method checks how many resources are missing in the warehouse to reach a certain quantity of that resource type but it doesn't remove them.
      Parameters:
      resource - represents the resource type to check
      requestedQuantity - is the quantity to check
      Returns:
      how many resources misses

    • checkResourcesIntoStrongbox

      public boolean checkResourcesIntoStrongbox​(ResourceType resource, int quantity)
      Public method. checkResourcesIntoStrongbox method check if strongbox contains "quantity" resources of "resource" resource type
      Parameters:
      resource - is the resource type to check
      quantity - is the quantity of that resource type
      Returns:
      true if it contains at least that resources

    • takeResourcesFromStrongbox

      public boolean takeResourcesFromStrongbox​(ResourceType resource, int quantity)

    • addResourceToStrongboxTemp

      public void addResourceToStrongboxTemp​(ResourceType resource, int quantity)
      Public method. addResourceToStrongboxTemp is called if takeResourcesFromWarehouse method returns true: this method adds resources into the temporary strongbox "resourcesToAddToStrongbox"(the resources earned from production, written in the DevelopmentCard activated from the player).

    • fromStrongboxTempToStrongbox

      public void fromStrongboxTempToStrongbox()
      Public method. fromStrongboxTempToStrongbox method puts into the strongbox's player all the resources earned with all the productions activated by the player in this turn

    • isTempStrongboxEmpty

      public boolean isTempStrongboxEmpty()
      Public method. to see if a player has actually done a production.

    • switchLevels

      public boolean switchLevels​(int maxSlotsFirst, int maxSlotsSecond)
      Public method. Called to swap the resources from two levels.
      Parameters:
      maxSlotsFirst - The first level to swap.
      maxSlotsSecond - The second level to swap.
      Returns:
      True if the swap is possible, false if not.
